org.hibernate.envers.boot

Interface AuditMetadataBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuditMetadataBuilderImplementor

    public interface AuditMetadataBuilder
    Contract for specifying various overrides to be used in the AuditMetadata building.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuditMetadataBuilder applyMappingCollector(org.hibernate.envers.configuration.internal.MappingCollector mappingCollector)
      Specify the MappingCollector implementation to use.
      AuditMetadataBuilder applyRevisionInfoEntityName(String revisionInfoEntityName)
      Specify the name of the entity to be used as the @RevisionEntity.
      AuditMetadataBuilder applyTrackEntitiesChangedInRevision(boolean trackEntitiesChangedInRevision)
      Specify whether entity names should be tracked within a revision.
      AuditMetadata build()
      Buld the AuditMetadata.

    • Method Detail

      • applyTrackEntitiesChangedInRevision

        AuditMetadataBuilder applyTrackEntitiesChangedInRevision(boolean trackEntitiesChangedInRevision)
        Specify whether entity names should be tracked within a revision.
        Parameters:
        trackEntitiesChangedInRevision - true to track entity names, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.
        See Also:
        EnversSettings.TRACK_ENTITIES_CHANGED_IN_REVISION

      • applyRevisionInfoEntityName

        AuditMetadataBuilder applyRevisionInfoEntityName(String revisionInfoEntityName)
        Specify the name of the entity to be used as the @RevisionEntity.
        Parameters:
        revisionInfoEntityName - the revision info entity name.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.

      • applyMappingCollector

        AuditMetadataBuilder applyMappingCollector(org.hibernate.envers.configuration.internal.MappingCollector mappingCollector)
        Specify the MappingCollector implementation to use.
        Parameters:
        mappingCollector - the mapping collector.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.

      • build

        AuditMetadata build()
        Buld the AuditMetadata.
        Returns:
        The built metadata.
